metadata.dc:author: Navarrete Montoya, A
de la Fuente, I
de las Heras González, M
Salinas Ramos, J
metadata.dc:description: In the near future molecular biology will permit selection of patients with bladder cancer who can benefit more from radiotherapy and chemotherapy. There will also be an increase in the response rate due to the possibility of regulating the genes responsible for cellular radiosensitivity.
metadata.dc:title: Factores pronósticos y radiosensibilidad en cáncer de vejiga.
[Prognostic factors and radiosensitivity of bladder cancer].
